title: Don's Ultimate 3Ds/AUTODESK animation software and Tutorial  Meg
description:
Don's Ultimate 3Ds/AUTODESK animation software and Tutorial  Mega pack 
Hi everyone, I've put together this huge package of stuff for the beginner-to-expert  in 3D animation All up to date and all work great! "Why?", Well let's call it Karma, after all the downloading I've done I feel I need to seed for a bit. Everything is .Rar-ed up only once so I can seed.
 I know it's a huge download but, OMG!, so worth it if you don't know your polygon from your protractor. Enjoy!
Software:

Tutorials:
All of these are online video courses, comparable to a number of university courses in fact a few of them are. Ignore the numbering system they're in. That was just my order. Watch them any way you want! Although, the first one is the coolest! you get to build, from polygon to production an epic battle between Fairy and Robot. Enjoy!
